trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of entities.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.EntitiesDescriptor"></xref> class.

The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.EntitiesDescriptor.ChildEntities%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.EntitiesDescriptor.ChildEntityGroups%2A> properties are initialized to empty collections in the new instance.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.EntitiesDescriptor"></xref> class with the specified collection of child <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.EntitiesDescriptor"></xref>.
The entities descriptor collection.
Initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.EntitiesDescriptor.ChildEntityGroups*> property.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.EntitiesDescriptor"></xref> class with the specified collection of child <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.EntityDescriptor"></xref>.
The entity descriptor collection.
Initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.EntitiesDescriptor.ChildEntities*> property.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.EntitiesDescriptor"></xref> class with the specified collection of child <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.EntityDescriptor"></xref> and the specified collection of child <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.EntitiesDescriptor"></xref>.
The entity descriptor collection.
Initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.EntitiesDescriptor.ChildEntities*> property.
The entities descriptor collection.
Initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.EntitiesDescriptor.ChildEntityGroups*> property.
Gets the child <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.EntityDescriptor"></xref> for this entities collection.
The collection of child <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.EntityDescriptor"></xref>.
The default is an empty collection.
Gets the child <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.EntitiesDescriptor"></xref> for this entities collection.
The collection of child <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.EntitiesDescriptor"></xref> for this entity.
The default is an empty collection.
Gets or sets the name of this entities collection.
The name of the entities collection.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
